ygData.subject: Re: Lvl 12 pet spell question
ygData.msgSnippet: I am almost lvl 13 now, and I ve cast a LOT of pets with the lvl 12 pet spell... Every single one has been blue.  My guess is that it really casts a lvl 9 to
ygData.messageBody:
I am almost lvl 13 now, and I've cast a LOT of pets with the lvl 12 pet spell...

Every single one has been blue. My guess is that it really casts a lvl 9 to 11 or 10
to 11 pet.

-Poppa



TkAdam@... wrote:

> From: TkAdam@...
>
> In a message dated 2/11/00 10:50:28 AM Eastern Standard Time,
> nrusso@... writes:
>
> > What is the deal with the lvl 12 pet spell? I have a necro guide (from
> > Allakhazam's) that says the lvl 12 pet spell is supposed to summon a pet
> > from lvl 11 - 13. I've lost count of how many times I cast that spell at
> > lvl 12 and I was NEVER able to get anything other than a blue-conning pet!
> >
> > Have you all had the same experience, or have I not sacrificed the right
> > kind of chicken to the Verant gods?
> >
> > Mujahid 13 Necromancer Solusek Ro
>
> Allakazam's is wrong...
>
> at 12 you get an 8-12 pet, not 11-13 :(
> At some point the scale gets even worse...
>
> The rational is the the pet is an NPC and the levels do not scale the same
> way...
>
